page.title: 06ST DAVIDS ESTATE
page.content: THIS IS A LARGE PRE-WAR COUNCIL ESTATE WITH VERY FEW AMENITIES OF ANY DESCRIPTION FOR RESIDENTS. THE ESTATE IS IN A RUN-DOWN CONDITION WITH A FEW HOUSES AND GARDENS WELL KEPT, BUT MOST NOT. THERE WERE MANY DOGS ROAMING THE STREETS WITH DROPPINGS, GLASS AND PAPER LITTERING THE PAVEMENTS. PEOPLE INTER- VIEWED SAID THEY WOULD LIKE MORE PLAY AREAS FOR THE CHILDREN.THERE WAS NOT A LOT OF TRAFFIC ON THE ESTATE. BETWEEN CRANFORD RD. AND BOUGHTON GREEN RD.CONSISTED OF PRIVATE TERRACED HOUSES QUITE A STABLE AREA WITH FEW UNOCCUPIED PROPERTIES. THE CUL-DE-SACS GAVE VERY PEACEFUL, SECLUDED RESIDENTIAL AREAS ALTHOUGH CAR PARKING COULD BE A PROBLEM BECAUSE FEW HOUSES HAD A GARAGE OR GARAGE SPACE.
